page.title: 16Recreation in West Enfield.
page.content: By doing a survey in our school we found that the children's main recreation activities are Guides or Brownies (51),Scouts or Cubs (46),Sunday School (59), and Girls or Boys Brigade (20). Our area is mainly a residential one.Most of the houses have fairly large gardens and almost all the people questioned named gardening as one of their main pastimes.The other pastime which seemed almost universal was D.I.Y.Watching T.V.,Video and playing computer games are popular with children and adults.Other pastimes which proved popular were listening to and playing music,dancing watching and playing different sports. As family groups they go out together swimming,to watch sport,to the theatre cinema and museums.
